author: Elizabeth C
title: Dull and lifeless
text:
Had a week here in February and would not recommend it for holiday makers.
The hotel is very bland and corporate with lots of hard edges and very little character.
Main issues are
*the fridge is automated with a warning that if you move anything you will automatically be charged! So only the tiniest space should you wish to put your own drinks or snacks in the fridge (something quite likely to happen on a week long trip).
*the beds are small, hard and have very very "firm" pillows.
*lots of light from the downstairs restaurant gets in to the room despite the thick curtains
*the temperature in the room is very hard to control - despite the in room controls the room would swing from super hot to freezing cold throughout the night
*the anti slip on the bath was like sandpaper for your behind should you decide to take a bath -plus it was very discoloured which makes the bath look dirty.
Overall the hotel is well located and clean (other than the bath) but if you're looking for a real/fun london holiday I would look else where.
